tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Sandhya was extremely friendly and professional. She was patiently listening to my concerns and questions. She gave me the best advice on all my doubts and ensured safe delivery of my baby. I‚Äôll highly recommend her for anyone looking for a gynaecologist in and around Kalyan Nagar.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr. Sandhya Shivakumar is an exceptionally talented and patient doctor. After a critical experience with my first pregnancy, where I tragically lost my baby due to negligence at a previous hospital, I was determined to find a good doctor for my second pregnancy. Dr. Chaitra recommended Dr. Sandhya Shivakumar, and from the moment I met her, I felt reassured.

I shared my past pregnancy history and concerns with her, and she listened attentively to every detail. Throughout my pregnancy, she guided me with care and expertise. When the time came, she performed a C-section, and I delivered a healthy baby boy.

Dr. Sandhya Shivakumar is an amazing, friendly, and down-to-earth doctor. I highly recommend her to anyone seeking excellent prenatal care.

Thank you so much, Ma'am, for your care and concern towards me and my baby.

With lots of love and respect to you...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
She is very nice doctor and helpful , we were new in the city . She guided us very well in all possible way . Be it personal or professional. 

Heartfelt thank to Dr sandhya maam . Your experience and behaviour justified the proverb ‚Äú doctor are second god‚Äù

I will highly recommend to others to definitely approach dr sandhya shivakumar , for any of the gynecology and obstetrics need .

Thank you again !!
Dr Sandhya shivakumar

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I would very much recommend Dr. Sandhya mam for her down to earth and soft spoken nature. I consult her for my second pregnancy check up routines . I had bleeding issues and was hospitalized in ovum branch  in ring road(mam visits kalyan nagar) where mam doesn't consult but still she made up to visit me immediately after knowing my situation that too on a Sunday though the duty doctor had done all the examinations. And also she followed up the next day and gave detailed explanation of the issue with so much of patience and positive note. Feeling very safe in her hands and hoping for best.
reply_text: Thank you Yoshitha..l hope for the best too

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I consulted with Dr. Sandhya from the day I took a pregnancy test. Throughout the 9 months journey, she was just superb. She patiently clarified all our doubts, guided me and my husband really well on health and nutrition, ***** *********** *** *********** ****** *** most of all, ensured a healthy normal (vaginal) delivery of my daughter. I faced absolutely no issues and would definitely recommend her and Ovum Birthing Centre as your go-to place for pregnancy and delivery. Such doctors are a real blessing! Very grateful to her for all her support and guidance.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We met Dr Sandhya in Oct 2016 when my wife had and ectopic pregnancy and Dr Sandhya helped us in terminating the pregnancy. We were in constant touch with her through 2017-2018 when we were planning and she helped us a lot with right guidance and timely responses to all out queries. Very friendly and has a lot of patience to listen to everything my wife had to say. 

Thanks Dr for being with us and helping all through the pregnancy and performing a safe C sec to bring my Son out. Both the month and Son are doing fine, Thanks again Dr Sandhya.
reply_text: Thank you Surendra and Shilpa! Wish you all the best in the future too üòä

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Sandhya is a very experienced doctor* *** ******** **** **** ********* *** ********** I had some complications post my delivery and she provided very accurate and timely treatment that helped me recover. Even during my pre delivery days, she ensured my well being as well of my child by regular checkups. I did some research by asking few people for the best available gynaecologist in ramurthy nagar ,before deciding on my gyanec and I am very happy that I have got one.A heartfelt thanks to the doctor for providing a very memorable pre and post delivery care.
reply_text: Thank you Padmashree.. It was a pleasure to have you as a bright and cheerful patient

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I Consulted Dr. Sandhy shivkumar with friends reference.She is Soft spoken and  listens very patiently which is very hard to find nowadays. She answered all our queries since we were first time anxious parents.

After completion 3 months of  my pregnancy had some complication till 4 months but she treated very well and She even shared her personal mobile number and told us to call at any time.if we get any problem or in confused state, She answered our phone calls even it is late night or early morning. 

Recently delivered a beautiful baby girl at Ovum Hospitals.We recommend her and assure you'll be in safe hands.
reply_text: Thank you for the detailed feedback and recommendation!

I got total trust and confidence visiting such a caring, motherly, and patience doctor. *** ** * ******* ************* * **** **** **** ** ********** That one reason gave me confidence n I successfully delivered baby boy last week with her support n guidance. Very hard to find such a Dr these days. I would strongly recommend girls ladies to have their gynaecologist issues checked wit Dr. Sandhya n I'm sure all will get benefited. Delivery is another life for women n I experienced it wit Dr. Sandhya n I'm very thankful for that. You can get mother's trust wit Dr. Sandhya n I truly experienced it üòÄ
